SEARCH
Package com.app.service

Interface PlayerService

All Known Implementing Classes:
PlayerServiceImpl
public interface PlayerService
Interface representing the player service, providing functionalities for managing player data and statistics.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    PlayerData
    addPlayer(PlayerDto playerData)
    Adds a new player to the system.
    PlayerData
    findPlayer(Long playerId)
    Finds a player by their ID.
    Map<Integer,String>
    getRankingOfPlayers()
    Retrieves the ranking of players.
    List<PlayerData>
    getTheBestPlayer()
    Retrieves a list of the best players based on their scores.
    List<PlayerData>
    getTheBestPlayerInPeriod(LocalDateTime from, LocalDateTime to)
    Retrieves a list of the best players within a specified time period.
    PlayerData
    removePlayer(Long id)
    Removes a player from the system by their ID.

  • Method Details

    • addPlayer

      PlayerData addPlayer(PlayerDto playerData)
      Adds a new player to the system.
      Parameters:
      playerData - the PlayerDto object containing the player's details.
      Returns:
      a PlayerData object representing the added player.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the provided playerData is null.

    • removePlayer

      PlayerData removePlayer(Long id)
      Removes a player from the system by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the player to be removed.
      Returns:
      a PlayerData object representing the removed player.

    • findPlayer

      PlayerData findPlayer(Long playerId)
      Finds a player by their ID.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the ID of the player to be found.
      Returns:
      a PlayerData object representing the found player.

    • getTheBestPlayer

      List<PlayerData> getTheBestPlayer()
      Retrieves a list of the best players based on their scores.
      Returns:
      a list of PlayerData objects representing the best players.

    • getTheBestPlayerInPeriod

      List<PlayerData> getTheBestPlayerInPeriod(LocalDateTime from, LocalDateTime to)
      Retrieves a list of the best players within a specified time period.
      Parameters:
      from - the start date and time of the period.
      to - the end date and time of the period.
      Returns:
      a list of PlayerData objects representing the best players in the specified period.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the start date is after the end date or if any date is null.

    • getRankingOfPlayers

      Map<Integer,String> getRankingOfPlayers()
      Retrieves the ranking of players.
      Returns:
      a Map where the key is the player's rank and the value is the player's login.
